releaseNotes: - Fix for missing AlphaFS.dll - Update vendored chocolatey to stable 0.10.7 - Update vendored chocolatey to stable 0.10.5 - Add required tags element to boxstarter.common nuspec - Fix Set-ExplorerOption argument names - Fix Nuspec dependencies to be exact - Update vendored chocolatey to stable 0.10.4 - Randomize package names generated from script to avoid file locks - Update vendored Chocolatey to 0.10.4 beta - Add Icon toggling of task bar notifications in Set-TaskbarOptions - Fix registry key name in Set-TaskbarOptions on some Windows 10 versions - Fix Default of RebootOk in boxstarter shell - Stop powershell profile loading when in powershell v2
